dct_alternative_sm: Lower mines or Mormon Diggings, no. 3
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Show topography, vegetation, drainage, mines, routes, etc. along a portion of the South Fork of the American River, California.

From a map set including: Topographical sketch of the Gold and Quicksilver District of California, July 25th. 1848 E.O.C.O. Lt. U.S.A. -- Positions of the Upper and Lower gold Mines on the South Fork of the American River, California. July 20, 1848.
Appears in Polks' Message to Congress: U.S. Congress. House. Exec. doc. no. 1, 30th Cong., 2nd Sess., December 5, 1848 (Serial 537).
